description.@en: With this ring, the Hellfurnance shall protect.

data.distance: Any one person you can touch

criticalFailure.@en: The ring crumbles to dust, completely destroyed. In return, you suffer [[/roll 1D10+1]] mental Peril.

criticalSuccess.@en: As above, but they also cannot be made Prone by the actions of a foe.

effect.@en: After successfully casting this spell, the person you touch cannot be Injured or made to Bleed for the Duration of the spell. In addition, when they would suffer Damage from a melee or ranged weapon, even after failing to Dodge or Parry, they take no Damage instead. They can only avoid Damage from a melee or ranged weapon once for the Duration of the spell and it must be the Damage from the first successful attack made against them.

reagents.@en: An obsidian ring, placed upon the finger
